g^SULJL
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF RADIO AND TELEVISION BROADCASTERS
1771 N, Street, Northwest Washington 6, D.C. Decatur 2-9300
JUSTIN HILLER
Chairman of the Board
and General Counsel March 1, 1954
Mr, Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr, Skorniai
This will acknowledge receipt of your letter of February 23, 1954.
I appreciate very much your gracious invitation and wish that it were
possible for me to be with you on April 8,
Unfortunately, however, I have a long-standing engagement in
California for that date which makes impossible my acceptance of your
invitation.
I hope that' you have a splendid meeting. I m sure that your
folks will all enjoy Mr. Strelbert.
Pleas® give my regards to Seymour Siegel and to others of your
group with whoa I may be acquainted.
Sincerely yours,
/s/ Justin Miller
Justin Miller.
J!0if
NAEB Headquarters
3-8-54.
